content:
Once you open a stream in the sidebar I don't think so there's any way to minimize the topics showing except pressing esc button.
image.png
I think a small cross button (to minimize the topics) on right of the stream would be nice for user experience.

For now there is no way to minimize without selecting something else. And if user minimizes but still inside a topic of this stream we should show what is selected somewhere. There is no easy solution now. Left sidebar redesign is in progress and we had a first round of design review.
